title: Anticoagulants
author: ayobami
description: Learning a table that summarizes the various anticoagulants in chemical pathology

questions.question: B
questions.answer: Glycolytic Inhibiton (Enolase) and Chelation of Calcium

questions.question: H
questions.answer: Synergistic action with antithrombin III to prevent coagulation

questions.question: I
questions.answer: Electrolytes, Urea and Creatinine Test (EUCR), Liver Function Tests

questions.question: F
questions.answer: Glycated Hemogloin, Packed Cell Volume, Complete Blood Count
